{0pt}{3.25ex plus 1ex minus .2ex}{1.5ex plus .2ex}

{\normalfont\normalsize\bfseries}{\theparagraph}{1em}{}
\titlespacing*{\paragraph}
{0pt}{3.25ex plus 1ex minus .2ex}{1.5ex plus .2ex}
